Package me.Treidex.GameAPI

Class Program

java.lang.Object
me.Treidex.GameAPI.Program
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public final class Program
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
This the Main Program as of itself, it is used whenever you want to make a new Game.
Author:
Treidex

    • Program

      public Program​(GameManager gameManager, java.lang.String windowName, int maxTPS, int fixedTPS, int width, int height)

      windowName - The Name of the Window.
